scripts.claude:refactor: npx -p @anthropic-ai/claude-code claude -p "Refactor the selected code to improve readability and maintainability"
scripts.claude:explain: npx -p @anthropic-ai/claude-code claude -p "Explain this code in detail"
scripts.claude:patch: npx -p @anthropic-ai/claude-code claude -p "Review and suggest improvements for this code"
